name: Pacific States Aviation
about: Pacific States Aviation, located at Buchanan Field Airport in Concord, California, has been a premier flight training institution for nearly 40 years. With a strong focus on safety, education, and professionalism, we have trained thousands of pilots to exacting standards. Our experienced instructors prioritize student progress and safety, ensuring a solid foundation in flight training. We offer a range of programs, including the Young Falcons youth aviation camp, introductory flight lessons, and an airline pilot program. Our convenient location near San Francisco, Oakland, and Silicon Valley provides an ideal environment for instrument training with excellent weather and complex airspace. We are committed to delivering exceptional aviation services and creating a supportive community for future aviators. At Pacific States Aviation, we pride ourselves on making great pilots.
